entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:42 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 09:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
